reviewText: Does not play on DVD players in the U.S. I'm assuming that's what the "[Import anglais]" in the title means, but I don't speak/read/write any foreign languages so I can't be sure, and even if I did I wouldn't assume that because it's an imported DVD that it won't play here.  I think it would be helpful for the vendors to specifically state, in plain English, that this will not play in the U.S.
